review: I'll be honest, I had no idea what the Fire Stick was before I bought it. I was simply looking for something that let me stream my new Kindle to the TV like my first generation Kindle could- with a mini USB to HDMI. I had no idea the Stick would replace that, (I am in my 20's and not tech savvy at all). The FireStick is amazing! I use it almost daily to listen to Pandora or watch Netflix and HBOGo and it still gives me full use of my Kindle at the same time. I would have paid double for the ease and convenience, it is another great Amazon product.

review: I recently got a free Fire Stick with my subscription with Sling TV. I figured it would be a good way to stream entertainment in my bedroom, I have a PS3 in the living room, but I'm sorely disappointed. The Fire Stick is slow, logs off my internet randomly, and refuses to play my MLB.TV app (it pauses every two seconds then quits). MLB.TV works perfectly on my PS3 in my living room which is literally 15 feet away, so I know it's not a problem with my internet speed. So far I'm not a fan of this product. I'm just glad it was free, I just wish I opted for the free Roku Stick instead. My father has two Rokus and has never had a problem with either of them.
